name: Notion Project Manager
description: Introducing the simple solution for managing your projects - the Notion Project Manager. This template is designed to take the hassle out of organizing and tracking your projects, so you can focus on what really matters - getting things done.With three features, this template will help streamline your objectives:Project Tracker: At a glance, see all of your projects and how they're progressing.Task System: Easily drag and drop your tasks between statuses.Automated Priorities: Know what's importa
features: Project Tracker: At a glance, see all of your projects and how they're progressing.; Task System: Easily drag and drop your tasks between statuses.; Automated Priorities: Know what's important fast with the priority overview.; How do I get the template for free?Under "Name a fair price:", enter 0 and then check out.
